description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Flap your little wings to fly through a challenging course, but in the end you will fail!  *16player couch co-op.  *16player local versus mode.  *Online P2P scoreboards for Gold members.  This is a clone that preys on the success of an iPhone game, in hopes of a quick buck. All the money you waste on this title will be spent on my serious game project: "Lootfest".
